dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 337 IH: To provide technical and financial assistance for groundwater recharge, aquifer storage, and water source substitution projects.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Costa (for himself, Mr. Valadao, Mr. Thompson of California, and Ms. Lofgren) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To provide technical and financial assistance for groundwater recharge, aquifer storage, and water source substitution projects.

section.header: Assistance for groundwater recharge, aquifer storage, and water source substitution projects
section.text: Section 40910 of the Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act (Public Law 117â€“58) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: Of the unobligated balances of amounts made available under section 40901, there may be made available to the Secretary $3,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2026 through 2031 to carry out subsection (a).
